EmailTemplate.subject: We have an outcome for your case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Preferred_Name__c),Contact.FirstName,Contact.Preferred_Name__c)},
We are investigating the status of your delivery
Thank you for your patience during our investigation.
Despite our best efforts we are sorry to say that we have been unsuccessful in locating your delivery and now consider it to be lost in transit. We apologise that we don’t have a better outcome to provide.
Please reach out to your sender for advice on next steps regarding your delivery, as we trust they will be best placed to offer a resolution in line with their terms and conditions. If the sender is unable to assist you or you can’t reach them, please let us know.
Australia Post
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
